auth_recover:
## Password updated!
Your Duffelbag account with name **{username}** has been updated to use password ||{password}||.
auth_new_collapsed:
## Account successfully created!
Your shiny new Duffelbag account with name **{username}** has been created.
auth_new_expanded:
## Account successfully created!
Your shiny new Duffelbag account with name **{username}** has been created.

Any commands run on this {platform} account will automatically use this Duffelbag account.
You can register other {platform} accounts to this Duffelbag account using {cmd$account_bind_platform}.
You'll need to remember your username and password to do this.
If you ever forget them, you can reset your password using {cmd$account_recover}.
